methods.name: connectedDevices

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise resolving to an object containing the connected devices

tags.name: returns
tags.text: .devices - An array of connected USB serial devices

methods.docs: Get a list of currently connected USB serial devices.

methods.name: openSerial

tags.name: param
tags.text: options - Serial connection options

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise that resolves when the connection is established

methods.docs: Open a serial connection to a USB device.

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise that resolves when the connection is closed

methods.name: readSerial

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise resolving to an object containing the received data

tags.name: returns
tags.text: .data - The received data as a UTF-8 decoded string

methods.docs: Reads data from the serial port.

methods.name: writeSerial

tags.name: param
tags.text: options - The write options

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.data - The data to write as a UTF-8 encoded string that will be converted to bytes

methods.docs: Writes data to the serial port.

methods.name: addListener
methods.signature: (eventName: 'log', listenerFunc: (data: { text: string; tag: string; }) => void) => Promise<PluginListenerHandle> & PluginListenerHandle

parameters.name: listenerFunc
parameters.docs: - Callback function called when log messages are received

tags.name: param
tags.text: eventName - Must be 'log'

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc - Callback function called when log messages are received

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc.data - Object containing the log data

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc.data.text - The log message text

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc.data.tag - The log tag/category

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise resolving to a listener handle for removing the listener

methods.docs: Listen for log messages from the plugin.

parameters.name: listenerFunc
parameters.docs: - Callback function called when a device connects

tags.name: param
tags.text: eventName - Must be 'connected'

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc - Callback function called when a device connects

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc.data - The connected device information

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise resolving to a listener handle for removing the listener

parameters.name: listenerFunc
parameters.docs: - Callback function called when a device is attached

tags.name: param
tags.text: eventName - Must be 'attached'

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc - Callback function called when a device is attached

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc.data - The attached device information

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise resolving to a listener handle for removing the listener

parameters.name: listenerFunc
parameters.docs: - Callback function called when a device is detached

tags.name: param
tags.text: eventName - Must be 'detached'

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc - Callback function called when a device is detached

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc.data - The detached device information

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise resolving to a listener handle for removing the listener

methods.name: addListener
methods.signature: (eventName: 'data', listenerFunc: (data: { data: string; }) => void) => Promise<PluginListenerHandle> & PluginListenerHandle

parameters.name: listenerFunc
parameters.docs: - Callback function called when data is received

tags.name: param
tags.text: eventName - Must be 'data'

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc - Callback function called when data is received

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc.data - Object containing the received data

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc.data.data - The received data as a UTF-8 decoded string

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise resolving to a listener handle for removing the listener

methods.name: addListener
methods.signature: (eventName: 'error', listenerFunc: (data: { error: string; }) => void) => Promise<PluginListenerHandle> & PluginListenerHandle

parameters.name: listenerFunc
parameters.docs: - Callback function called when errors occur

tags.name: param
tags.text: eventName - Must be 'error'

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc - Callback function called when errors occur

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc.data - Object containing the error information

tags.name: param
tags.text: listenerFunc.data.error - The error message

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise resolving to a listener handle for removing the listener

methods.docs: Listen for error events from the serial communication.

methods.name: removeAllListeners

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise that resolves when all listeners are removed

methods.docs: Remove all listeners for all events.
